remarks:
Substitution doesn't affect a constant ` B ` (in which ` x ` does not occur). ~ csbconstgf with distinct variable requirement.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 22-Jul-2012.) 

---

 Substitution doesn't affect a constant ` B ` (in which ` x ` is not free). ~ csbconstgf with distinct variable requirement.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 22-Jul-2012.)
statement:
csbconstg $p |- ( A e. V -> [_ A / x ]_ B = B ) $.
$d B x $.
